Hi there,

I have 2 issues with AutoCompleteBox which seem like bugs

 

                <input:AutoCompleteBox
                    Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="1"
                    Name="txtOrderManager" Text="{Binding Path=OrderManager, ValidatesOnDataErrors=True}"
                    IsTextCompletionEnabled="True" Populating="txtOrderManager_Populating" />

                <input:AutoCompleteBox
                    Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="1"
                    Name="txtOrderManager" Text="{Binding Path=MyProperty, ValidatesOnDataErrors=True}"
                    IsTextCompletionEnabled="True" Populating="txt_Populating" />

1. Text property binding does not update the MyProperty when user types something or selects a value from the list and then tabs out. 
2. When IDataErrorInfo validation fails on AutoCompleteBox, the box has the red border but the tooltip with the error message doesn't show when I hover over it.
Both issues don't exist in the system TextBox.
Please advise,
-Dash.
